html.p: The zLinux Universal Forwarder expands options for data collection to Mainframes running the zLinux operating system.
To download the zLinux Universal Forwarder, please go to http://www.splunk.com/download/
For documentation on how to install the universal forwarder, please use http://docs.splunk.com/Documentation/Splunk/latest/Forwarding/Deployanixdfmanually
